name: Sky Explorer Demo (prototype)
description:
Please fullscreen!  Also, there are lots of known bugs, running list here: https://www.notion.so/67f7e596eef04357be015ffe0729c125?v=7b477b3f12f14e66b6679d1... Please let me know if you find more!

Controls:

WASD to move, space to jump (you can control movement in the air and jump forwards/backwards)

Collect nearby items with E, Drop item currently equipped with R

Click icon on bottom right to open inventory, Click on an icon in inventory to equip that item, item with square icon is your hand = no item equipped

interact with items nearby pressing "F" while no item equipped (to go through the door, walk up to the door and press "F")
